U.S.  Mike Pence  shut the door today on a run for the presidency, but left open the likelihood that he'll seek a different office: Governor of Indiana.  In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana,   Mike Pence , R-Columbus, said of himself and wife Karen in a letter being sent to supporters. On Saturday I was horrified to witness Mayor Tom Leppert Pro Tem Dwaine Caraway gleefully proclaiming that a power had been bestowed on him to give the man who tried to kill my dog a key to my city, Richard Hunter said.
